long_description:
# Mineclone2 Underwater Challenge
### by NO11

A survival challenge for Mineclone2.

Try to survive in a flooded world. At the start you get a water breathing potion.
After that, you should think about how else you can survive. Maybe with doors? ;)
name: mcl_underwater_challenge
short_description: A survival challenge for Mineclone2. Try to survive in a flooded world.
title: Mineclone2 Underwater Challenge
